args:
Tiana and the others resolve to seek aid from
the world above. Alex and Tiana move to halt
the invasion, while Mym heads for the surface.
The operation seems poised to succeed...
until Alex is captured by the abyssians.
No. But we must find her, and swiftly.\nHer actions have brought devastation to\nthe city!
We've even had reports that she moves in\nthe company of surface-dwellers.
Worse still, she invited them here herself.\nThis is sacrilege, I tell you!
She ought to be executed at once.\nThe priestess of the abyss is a traitor!
Gee, I wonder if they're with the pro-\ninvasion faction. Sheesh...
Even still, we can't hide out.\nWe've gotta DO something.
(＂Never should any rouse great\nLeviathan from his slumber...＂)
(The code wasn't written to cultivate\nnew life—it was created to stop us\nfrom inviting our very annihilation.)

(Yet the message was muddied as it was
passed down from one generation to the
next, until it reached my ears as
something altogether different.)
(I'm a failure as a priestess of the abyss.\nI have no right to save anything anymore.)
On your feet, Tiana.\nIt's not curtains for us yet.
I'm afraid it is.\nI'm useless. Powerless.
How can you say that when you've\nyet to lift a finger?

You tried to get a dragon to solve things,
and it didn't go the way you wanted, so
you're crying about it. You haven't exactly
exhausted all your options here.

Leviathan has his own issues.
If you want to have a hope of saving
Aquaphos, you're gonna need enough guts
to deal with both him and your people!
Easy for you to say! You're from the\nsurface! You don't know what it's like here!
Look, Tiana. It's normal to feel afraid\nwhen the stakes are so high.
But facing challenges head-on is precisely\nwhat helps us grow stronger.
This is no time to lose heart.\nI think you know that.
You saved us. And this time,\nwe want to save you.
It doesn't matter where any of us are from.\nWe can stand united as allies—as friends.
There's a good girl. Now, we have an idea.
Just...try to keep an open mind, okay?
More quakes and undersea eruptions?\nThings are really going south down here.
This kingdom is doomed if Leviathan\nis left to his own devices.
And so...we'll call in a favor from on high.
We are allied with a family up there\nwho can make pacts with dragons.
And with the power of those pacts, we can\nkeep even Leviathan's considerable power\nin check.
I know the abyssians aren't exactly keen\non working with their terrestrial neighbors.
But I wouldn't suggest it unless I believed\nit would work. And I do.
Never in my life would I have thought of\npetitioning the surface people for help.
But after meeting the two of you,\nI'm willing to put my trust in them.
Okay, Mym. I accept your proposal.
The plan still carries considerable risk.\nAnd if we fail, you may not be able to\nreturn here. Are you at peace with that?
Yes. If that is the price I must pay to\nprotect what I hold dear, then so be it!
Then it's a done deal. Now, let's talk\ntactics, ladies! Tiana, the map.
Right now, we're here. First, we head\nbeyond the main thoroughfare to this gate.
From there, we can make it out into the\nopen ocean. We should be able to avoid\nthe Keeper of the Seas by going this way.
The pro-invasion faction is sure to\nhave guards posted, so we'll need\nto stay vigilant.
Right. They're eager to capture me.

But that works in our favor. If I distract the
people keeping watch, then Mym can slip
out to the sea unnoticed and head for the
surface.
Consider it done. I'll use my dragon power\nto get there lickety-split, and then I'll call\nmy darling and our friends!
Long story. Don't worry about it. But Mym,\nonce you're out, how do you plan to get\nback to Aquaphos?

We've got dragons like Mercury waiting up
top. I'm sure we can manage something.
More importantly, I need you to take care
of Tiana.
Of course. She'll be safe with me.
Please let me fight too. This problem\nis ours. I'm not going to waver anymore,\nnor am I going to give up!
Atta girl. Okay, you two, let's get this show\non the road! Er...trench? Whatever oceans\nhave.
Don't worry. I only knocked them out.
About time for me to say toodles for now!
Worry about that later!\nSomeone STOP them!
Sorry, folks! I'm a busy gal.\nGotta cut and run!
(Looks like Mym got through safe.\nAnd now—)
